name: Knife Throw: Flippy Fruits Hit
description:
Prepare yourself to break wooden logs with your helix of knives. Have you played that game, where you had to dash logs with knife hit? If not, now you have a chance to change it. Knife Throw: Flippy Fruits Hit is a simulator, where you have to dash logs with knife hit, flip knives into a log to break it. Show this log what the knife rush means. Create a helix of knives. Just throw your knives into a log to dash it. Flip every given knife to break the log. The only thing you have to know is that you cannot dash your knives, which are already in a log. Just create a helix of knives and break that log with your knife rush.

In this simulator, you can open skins for knife you are going to flip. Throw your knives into a log to make a knife hit. After breaking each log, you are going to flip your knives on following level. Also, do not forget, that every fifth log is defended by a boss, for breaking which, you will open special knife skin. For each knife hit or knife rush, you earn points, which you can spend to unlock new skins for your knives. Share your scores and achievements with your friends. Create helix of knives and destroy every log in the simulator. Flip your knives and tear into pieces the boss log with your knife rush. Dash with your knife hits every log on your way.

Knife Throw: Flippy Fruits Hit is a free to play simulator of knife rush, which you would definitely like. Flip the knives, throw it into target, dash the log with your knife hit and complete every boss level. Create your own helix of knives and let it dash every log in the simulator. Call your friends and find out whose helix of knives will more logs of wood. Show your friends that you are the master of knife rush and break every log in the simulator. Check your accuracy and try to hit every log, in our new knife rush simulator.
